availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Mary "Polly" Grimes Sherrow (Jessamine County, KY, resident)

body.p: Jessamine County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Isaac Sherrow in Garrard County, Kentucky on December 19, 1818. Mother of Martha Sherrow, Isaac Sherrow, Michael Sherrow, James Sherrow, and Mary Sherrow. Resident in Jessamine County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident in Jessamine County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jessamine County, District 1, p. 21A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jessamine County, p. 72.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Garrard County Marriages, Film #000183256, p. 477.
